function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus in medical settings due to aerosol-generating procedures","Impact":"Increased risk of infection from airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation systems and control measures to reduce the spread of infections","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air filtration, and monitoring equipment","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in healthcare settings leading to increased risk of infection transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of infection spread in healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper ventilation rates are met, implementing natural ventilation measures, and following WHO guidance","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, ventilation rate monitors, air exchange systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of specific guidance on proper ventilation rates in nonmedical settings for reducing infection transmission","Impact":"Increased uncertainty and potential risk of infection spread in nonmedical settings","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing general ventilation guidance for nonmedical settings, and following ASHRAE recommendations","Technologies":"General ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, and ASHRAE guidelines","People":"General public, workers in nonmedical settings","Owner":"Building management, ASHRAE"}]}
